name: Drew Smoke's Shooting Gallery
description:
It's time to get trigger happy and go bananas.. or umm watermelons, in this new ultra-destructible shooting gallery.

Take your time taking shots and exploring what secrets lay in the gallery itself...

Features:

-One weapon, infinite ammo for infinite fun!

-Destructible targets, walls, ceilings, and yes even the floor.

-5 different achievements to unlock.

-Future updates to come!

-Oh and I do apologize if you meet the gallery's ghost. You'll know when you shot him by accident... O_o   . I was unable to remove him from the source code. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Don't forget to like/share and leave a comment! =)

-Drew Smoke

Indie Game Dev
